help: A new, unique OBI ID. Use Term ID Reservations to get the latest ID.
A new, unique text label describing the term.
One or more synonyms separated by a pipe (|)
A one-sentence textual defintion describing the term.
The source (person, PMID, etc.) of the defintion.
A brief example of how the term may be used.
One or more names of the term editors separated by a pipe (|)
The name of the person or group who requested the term.
A link to the GitHub issue tracker where the term was requested.
The type of axiom created from logical defintions.
The direct, named parent class for this new term.
Extra logical axioms to include as subclass or equivalent statements. These must be in Manchester Syntax.
